website_summaries.verdict: The best mermaid tail available – competitors have tried but can't top their quality and patented design.
pros: Stands out for the patented reinforced fin tips that protects them from damage and patented monofin technology that enables fast swimming
Available in several sizes and colors
cons: The fabric covering isn't as durable as the underlying construction, and the waist fit for some users is somewhat tight

customer_reviews.title: We love FINFUN!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES it. The fit and quality are superb! We bought another brand last year and was sorely disappointed. It was poorly made and didn't last. The monofin was hard plastic and uncomfortable. You guys hit a grand slam with this product!The fin fun is definitely the way to go. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: nanny

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 years old, wears about a size 12 shorts. Ordered a women's small. It is a little long, but I knew it would be. She and her smaller friends wear it with no trouble. Otherwise, fits great. She loves it and has no trouble putting it on / off. Will be ordering one for my other daughter for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Release your inner mermaid!
customer_reviews.text: You have never seen such large smiles as kid fantasies meets reality. Now she is building muscles a landlubber was not aware mermaids contain. Slightly large which give her a year to grow into and another to grow out of and have years of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric West

customer_reviews.title: Overall she is so happy with this tail
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this tail and absolutely loves it. Everything fit as expected and works wonders. There was an issue with the stitching coming undone along the foot hole of the neoprene sleeve; however, their customer service was on point and resolved the issue the same day! Overall she is so happy with this tail!
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Great tail true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 12 for my 13 year old daughter and it fits just perfect. She is very slim and average height. I was worried that the adult size would be too wide and I think it would have been. She absolutely loves her tail and swims with it in the pool and the sea. It's great quality, easy to use and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Silden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this product, she wants to practice and swim
customer_reviews.author: Arkie Ogonowski

customer_reviews.title: Safety, Comfort, Fun & Imagination
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was ecstatic to receive this item and especially in her favorite color. Too bad there was not a case or bag to carry this in especially the monofin. Fit well, the fabric and design is quality materials. Will provide countless hours of Fun & Imagination being a Mermaid. Very important to understand how to swim with it and how to get in and out of it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Wright

customer_reviews.title: My little mermaid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a child size12 for my granddaughter who is a very tall and slim 11 year old just under 5 feet. It fit perfectly. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: cdurand007

customer_reviews.title: Great ab workout
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 of these tails 3 for my kids and 2 as gifts. They are great. My kids are the talk of the pool! The first one we got was a plastic monodic which broke after a year then finfun corrected that problem by Changing it to rubber. It makes the kids swim fast! Great ab workout!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Znidarcic

customer_reviews.title: She's a real mermaid!
customer_reviews.text: The young girl I bought this for is beyond thrilled! It fits her beautifully, really lets her swim, and we can't get her out of the water! This was her favorite holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: PearlWhite

customer_reviews.title: but the fit is perfect and the construction seems pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and she loves it! We have not tried it out in the water yet, but the fit is perfect and the construction seems pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Not the man in the picture!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty gift
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful design, some stitches had come out of the fin upon arrival, but can be repaired. Suit piece a bit long, but good to grow with. Glad I ordered the next size up. Not sure the product was worth the price, but the idea and design are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mussari

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loved it. I was a little scared that it ...
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter loved it. I was a little scared that it was not safe. Not sure how they would get out of it if they had any trouble in the water.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her mermaid tail. I was hesitant to purchase this tail because of the price, but with it still being a must have for pool time two years later, I have no regrets buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday durning the summer and she loved it ! It fits perfect and she looks so darn cute in it !
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: DAUGHTER LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. A friend of my daughter has purchased the older version and even though it may have a better looking cloth the new monofin is better and more flexible. She said that comparing the two, hers felt more natural to swim with.
customer_reviews.author: Dandansoy2001

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. My daughter loves this. Great quality product. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the campground pool!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and was the talk of the pool at the campground! the first run with it was not so good as it takes practice. She is working up her leg muscles, she says, swimming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Buzybee789

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yr old grand daughter, she loves it!! It comes up high past her waist which looks more natural. She has worn it everyday and rinses it out and hangs it to dry every time because she wants it to last till she out grows it. The quality is good, it doesn't seem to pull on the seams. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my daughter and she loves it.. she can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Camienmack 💐

customer_reviews.title: Pool fun
customer_reviews.text: We thought it great fun. It came in time for 11 year olds birthday. She has a pool and she loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great, a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great fun, very durable imo, just have to knock a star cause its so expensive, i mean really this thing should be like $80 at most.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: she loves it but end fin is sharp, yes ...
customer_reviews.text: she loves it but end fin is sharp, yes sharp took swimming needs to be sanded down or look out... But she loves to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: 2x2 make one.

customer_reviews.title: Super quick delivery and very nice product
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a 7 year old and she loves it!! Super quick delivery and very nice product.

customer_reviews.text: Its our second mermaid tale. My daughter used so much the first one, that eventually broke after 2 years. She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid tail
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and I love the colors of the fabric. This was a Christmas present for my 11 year old daughter who can't wait to use it in the pool!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My daughter loves her fin. Fit perfectly and the quality is worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: your daughters will love you forever
customer_reviews.text: For all of you dads, your daughters will love you forever:-)

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used it 3 times and all is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Peterson (Guest)

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The design is well executed and worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The design is well executed and worked perfectly in the pool. My grand daughter was thrilled. The only glitch is that I ordered a purple one and got a blue one. Luckily she didn't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 8. A size 12 fits her ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8. A size 12 fits her. So if we would have bought a size 8 it would have been to small. But she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! A little loose around the waist and tough to swim in but she still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love the mermaid fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new mermaid fin! As she swims, the fabric begins to pull down in the waist (it's probably a touch big), but that means she will be able to use it next year too!
customer_reviews.author: ALynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product....disappointed by material.
customer_reviews.text: The tail is really awesome & my daughter loves it. I'm a little disappointed that is already fading after 3 uses & I follow care instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her fin. It fits perfect and is holding up well.

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday present ever...
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my kid. She totally loves it. She swims faster but I would recommend watching small kids becuase its pretty heavy and they get tires fast. All the other kids were so jealous and of course she loved the attention. By far worth the price to see ur kid that excited.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Machado

customer_reviews.title: Her most favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this!! Her most favorite Christmas present. Wears around the house all the time.

customer_reviews.title: It came sooner than expected and my daughter was overjoyed with all the fun packaging
customer_reviews.text: It came sooner than expected and my daughter was overjoyed with all the fun packaging. She immediately put it on and loves it!

customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect! My daughter loved it and she looked and swam like a real mermaid. She is 13. I think you would need to be very comfortable in the water to swim in it which she was.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is fantastic. It looks like a real mermaid tail and swimming with it is a great experience.

customer_reviews.title: fits well and is easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter's 11th birthday. She loves it. Is made well, fits well and is easy to put on. Fun product.

customer_reviews.title: awesome product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, my daughter love it. I really tried not to buy this tale, I thought it was a waste of money, but she enjoy it so much that, well, I changed my mind. Let's see how much this fun last, because until now she have used just one time because it is winter.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved this for her Birthday and is showing it off too her friends.

customer_reviews.title: Excellence at its best!

customer_reviews.text: I am assuming she will love it because she wanted it so badly but it is a Christmas gift & I won't know her reaction till then!

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Tail
customer_reviews.text: I can't review at this time other than to say well made sizing looks correct. This is a Christmas present for my Granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: G'ette

customer_reviews.title: Not for cement bottom pool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new mermaid tail. She has had so much fun swimming in it. I do not recommend this product if you have a concrete bottom pool. She has not once walked on the pool patio with it on but both the monofin cover & the tail itself have holes & the fabric are fuzzy from swimming in the pool itself
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Schindler

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old daughter loves it! She just ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter loves it! She just has to wait until summer to try it out in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Dee

customer_reviews.title: My girls love these, but I am afraid they are not ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these, but I am afraid they are not going to hold up as long as they would like to use them. After just a week of using the tails properly according to recommendations, one of the tails got small holes in the fabric. After just a month, one of the inserts cracked while my daughter was swimming. The inserts that came with the fins are not made from very durable material. Fin Fun folks replaced both inserts but we had to pay for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

product_meta.title: Fin Fun Wear-Resistant Mermaid Tail for Swimming with Monofin Insert for Girls, Boys, Adults
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :22.83 x 21.81 x 1.26 inches; 1.9 Pounds
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :July 1, 2020
 * Manufacturer :Fin Fun
 * ASIN :B0855HWCBW

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #4,209 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #6 inGirls' Novelty Swimwear 
    *  #4 inSwimming Training Fins 
    *  #594 inGirls' Fashion 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars2,044 ratings
feature_bullets: ✅Fin Fun’s BEST-SELLING mermaid tails for swimming consistently receive TOP REVIEWS for being the most beautiful, safe, and comfortable mermaid tails in the world!

✅PATENTED Reinforced Tail Tip Technology PROTECTS the fabric tips of your mermaid tail from holes and comes with a 1-year tail tip warranty! No need for tip protector tape when you have built-in armor to guard against damage

✅SWIM FASTER, just like a REAL MERMAID, with the included PATENTED Fin Fun Monofin! Experience remarkable power as you glide through the water with our premium monofin that is easy to remove with a light tug and a kick!

✅ENGINEERED for speed, comfort, and safety, all Fin Fun Monofins feature an ULTRA-DURABLE FIN and NEOPRENE COVER for natural movement in the water. Fin Fun’s EXCLUSIVE DESIGN accommodates most foot sizes and provides a comfortable, natural fit
✅PREMIUM QUALITY Mermaidens collection mermaid tails are resistant to the effects of the sun and pool chemicals
